nodes.text: Trade Baron Mik Regrap was a female Neimoidian financial officer who served as Trade Federation Senator Lott Dod's advisor in the Galactic Senate during the Invasion of Naboo.

A Trade Federation financial officer, Trade Baron Mik Regrap served as Senator Lott Dod's advisor in the Galactic Senate. In the year 32 BBY, she was present in Dod's repulsorpod alongside him and his aide, Lufa Danak, when Senator Palpatine and Queen Padmé Amidala of Naboo accused the Trade Federation of invading their homeworld.
As a mathematician, Mik Regrap would always find the most profitable way to deal with parliamentary motions. A female Neimoidian, she had green skin and red eyes.
Regrap wore a light gray financial officer's collar over her dark blue and light gray robe, as well as a dark gray hat.

Originally created for the 1999 film Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace, Mik Regrap first appeared in its Star Wars Legends novelization by Terry Brooks, where she was referred to simply as a "trade baron". She was first identified in Dressing a Galaxy: The Costumes of Star Wars, a 2005 reference book by Trisha Biggar.
